name: Informix
description: This Test Connection validates the access against the Informix database and basic metadata extraction of schemas, tables, views, and stored procedures.

steps.name: CheckAccess
steps.description: Validate that we can properly reach the Informix database server and authenticate with the given credentials.
steps.errorMessage: Failed to connect to Informix. Please validate the hostPort, username, password, and serverName (INFORMIXSERVER) credentials.

steps.name: GetSchemas
steps.description: List all the schemas (owners) available to the user in the Informix database.
steps.errorMessage: Failed to fetch schemas. Please validate that the user has sufficient privileges to query systables.

steps.name: GetTables
steps.description: From a given schema, list the tables belonging to that schema. If no schema is specified, tables from a random schema will be listed.
steps.errorMessage: Failed to fetch tables. Please validate that the user has sufficient privileges to read table metadata from systables.

steps.name: GetViews
steps.description: From a given schema, list the views belonging to that schema. If no schema is specified, views from a random schema will be listed.
steps.errorMessage: Failed to fetch views. Please validate that the user has sufficient privileges to read view metadata from systables and sysviews.

steps.name: GetStoredProcedures
steps.description: List the stored procedures and functions available in the database. These are extracted from sysprocedures.
steps.errorMessage: Failed to fetch stored procedures. Please validate that the user has SELECT privileges on sysprocedures and sysprocbody.
